aberrantQuesrist.bugfix: Updates the date to reflect the new year.

aberrantQuesrist.refactor: Pulls the floors.dmi file apart into an easier navigable and better organized batch. QoL for spriters.

aberrantQuesrist.rscadd: New turf types, sands and grass.
New sprites for sand, saltwater, and modified mosaic tiles.

PineappleMan929.spellcheck: little accent thing so people spell inquisition titles right

aberrantQuesrist.bugfix: Male cows no longer have udders.

flleeppyy.code_imp: add new CI linter to check for unescaped brackets

KevinfromHP.balance: tweaked dungeoneer's loadout, giving them knuckles and adjusting skills.

Rockslp.rscadd: Adds several new items to the patreon loadout options.

Somniworld.balance: Made all mage summons give the same amount of resources for their tier. For instance a sprite now drops 6 fairy dust, the same way an imp drops 6 Infernal ashes.

Somniworld.bugfix: Noc's Eye warded summoning matrices no longer get bricked if you try to summon something alone.

snowyseshi.bugfix: gave abyssal guard their weapon skill and removed their swordfish

KevinfromHP.bugfix: Removed the ability for pacifists to wrestle
